meanings.sent1: The reappearances of the magician amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected reappearances of old friends brought joy to the party.
meanings.sent3: The reappearances of the mischievous cat always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reappearances of memories can sometimes be bittersweet.
meanings.sent5: The reappearances of shooting stars in the night sky were truly magical.

meanings.sent1: The reappearances of the sun after a storm are always welcomed.
meanings.sent2: The reappearances of the ghost in the story added suspense.
meanings.sent3: The reappearances of the lost sock in the laundry were quite mysterious.
meanings.sent4: The reappearances of old trends in fashion are quite common.
meanings.sent5: The reappearances of the comet in the sky were a rare sight.
